title.narrative: Drilling (6) surface wells in Tlabéri, Republic of Niger

description.narrative: Providing a source of safe water for drinking and personal use in the targeted areas with humanitarian needs, reducing the rate of epidemic diseases, supporting the economy by providing water for livestock, which is a source of livelihood for the residents of the targeted areas, limiting the migration of residents of the area and enhancing living there.

Providing drinking water for personal use to (60,699) beneficiaries, preserving livestock and enhancing the local and national economy, in addition to limiting the spread of epidemic diseases and promoting personal hygiene in a clean and safe environment in the targeted areas.
Providing potable water to the citizens of Niger by digging and preparing wells
